profile.title: I build things for the web.
profile.header_line: I'm a software engineer based in Kampala, Uganda specializing in building exceptional , high-quality web & mobile(React Native) applications.

internal.content: ["JavaScript (ES5, ES6+)","React, Next.js","React Native","Vue, Vuex, Nuxt.js","Angular","Node.js, Express.js","GraphQL, Apollo","PHP, Laravel, Yii","Python, Django","MySQL, MongoDB","DevOps, AWS, Firebase","Git, Docker, Vercel"]

data.overview:
Hello! I'm Herbert, a software engineer based in Kampala, Uganda.

**I am currently learning Golang, blockchain and web3.**

I have been a working as a Full Stack developer for the past 5 years in a professional setting and proficient in cutting edge web technologies like Angular, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React/Redux, Typescript, Node.js/Express, Next.js and much more.

Shortly after graduating from Kosin University, I joined the e-Perfect IT Company. Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

- Worked on the LevelTen Energy marketplace project
- Attended Project plannings and meetings. This is Linux desktop application by using ElectronJS

- Main focus was working in the OHRI project, leveraging OpenMRS 3.0 platform.
- Main role was to develop components for using IBM's Carbon Design System.
- Took part in dveloping the custom form builder.
- Made contributions to OpenMRS 3.0.

- Lead and coordinated the frontend team of 4 members. Working both remote and in-house.
- Attended decision-making meetings, design meetings, and project planning meetings.
- Handled presentations to senior staff to show progress

- Research, UI/UX design and implement technical specifications for the product based on client requirement
- Ensure projects are built to meet performance, security, and functional client requirements.
- Stay up-to-date on industry standards and incorporate them appropriately.
- Assist with testing, debugging, documentation, and overall quality assurance of projects.
- Involved in the requirement analysis, design, development, review, deployment as well as in the testing of the product.
- After service for individual client and upgrade website based on client desired feature.
- Used Git for code management tool and used Asana for task management and used Slack for the team meetings.

- Brought project mock-ups to life with React and Vuejs, evaluated website performance, troubleshoot front-end development issues, and devised new ways to build custom components.
- Identified bugs, drafted reports, and reported to senior management for support in the decision-making process.
- Started work on implementing a component Library using Storybook for the RocketPost project.

- Made a major contribution in developing open-source projects (HealthChecks and Wger) through Python (Flask / Django).
- Built scalable and maintainable RESTFul APIs by using NodeJS, Laravel, and Python.
- Created responsive web frameworks, while completing deliverables ahead of schedule.

projects.overview: Fanpop is one of the social platforms that was published in 2008ðŸ™€. The tech stack is Ruby on Rails, AWS, and PostgreSQL. I built the mobile application by using React Native Expo and GCP(Google Cloud Platform).

This project goal is to provide the B2B financial solution and as a middleware to be a bridge between the buyer, seller, and funder company and also proven all of the business workout and history by store these on Decentralized storage(Blockchain)

This is one of the shopping websites that provides a couple of smart wallets. By using GatsbyJS and Strapi Headless CMS we built the static website but the website content, mini style, and layout are manageable by updating Strapi content.
Lotic is a behavior change company delivering Enhanced Human Insights (EHI).

internal.content: ["TypeScript","AWS (CDK Lambda, S3, CloudFront, DynamoDB)","React Native Expo","Vercel","React","Styled Component","Redux","Storybook"]

projects.overview: AutoEz is a Car dealing website. Users can just buy their car at their best price. Developed this project with React and I used functional components and hooks in this project. For the CSS framework, we used React Bootstrap.
An online marketing platform like Fiverr and Upwork.

This is a Website Visitor Tracking Software for B2Bs. The website identifies companies browsing anonymously through your site and engages decision-makers on multiple channels, automatically. It can help the company can know their customers and website visitors.
Online video education website. It makes education more accessible by connecting students and teachers around the world.
